summary: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.
cast: Sam Worthington|Liam Neeson|Ralph Fiennes|Edgar Ramírez|Toby Kebbell|Rosamund Pike|Bill Nighy|Danny Huston|John Bell|Lily James|Alejandro Naranjo|Freddy Drabble|Kathryn Carpenter|Matt Milne|Kett Turton|Sinéad Cusack|Spencer Wilding|Juan Reyes|Jorge Guimerá|Asier Macazaga|Daniel Galindo Rojas|Lamberto Guerra|George Blagden|Killian Burke|Alastair Cording|Caoilfhionn Dunne|Martin Bayfield|Lasco Atkins|Richard Burman|Luke Davies|Domingo de Luis|Morgan Delle Piane|Richard Goss|Matthew Hobbs|Tim Howard|Alex Klaus|Dion Lloyd|Nick Massey|Jimmy Pethrus|Dean Pritchard|James Michael Rankin|Tony Reddington|Jd Roth-round|Steve Saunders|Paul Warren
title: Ira de titanes
